readme:
# IntoYunIoT IDE for Atom

* Cross-platform code builder without external dependencies to the system
  software:

    - 400+ embedded boards
    - 20+ development platforms
    - 10+ frameworks

metadata.name: intoyuniot-ide
metadata.description: Official IntoYunIoT IDE for Atom: The next generation integrated development environment for IoT. Cross-platform build system and unified debugger. Remote unit testing and firmware updates.
